alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 2:31PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Dorado, northeastern Calaveras and east central Amador Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 229 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverton, or 8 miles southwest of Kyburz, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... US Highway 50, Big Bend Summit, Fresh Pond, Pollock Pines, Camino, Riverton, Grizzly Flat, Pacific House, Kyburz, Somerset and White Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada
